datalog_actions: can_view(R, W, A) :- Reviewer(R), Webpage(W), Abstract(A), has_access(R, W).
can_generate(C, P, PC) :- CyberChair(C), Paper(P), PCC(PC), generates_proposal(C, P, PC).
can_assign(P, R) :- Paper(P), Reviewer(R), deadline_passed(D).
can_submit(A, P) :- Author(A), Paper(P), has_author(P, A).
can_watch_progress(PC, S, R) :- ProgramChair(PC), Submission(S), Review(R), has_progress(PC, S, R).
can_submit_paper(A, P) :- Author(A), Paper(P), submitted_abstract(A, AB, TimeAB), submitted_paper(A, P, TimeP), TimeAB <= TimeP - 7 days.
can_send(P, S, E) :- Person(P), Submission(S), Email(E), has_submission(P, S).

can_indicate(R, T, X) :- Reviewer(R), Topic(T), is_expert_on(R, T).
can_indicate(R, T, Y) :- Reviewer(R), Topic(T), knowledgable_in(R, T).
can_indicate(R, T, Z) :- Reviewer(R), Topic(T), informed_outsider_on(R, T).
cheng_policy:
No Path Found
No Path Found
No Path Found

datalog_actions: can_download(R, P) :- Reviewer(R), Paper(P), submitted(P).
can_fill_form(A, P) :- Author(A), Paper(P), submits(A, P).
can_receive_comment(A, P, C) :- Author(A), Paper(P), Comment(C), has_comment(P, C).
can_update_webpage(U, W) :- User(U), Webpage(W), has_webpage(U, W).
can_submit(A, P) :- Author(A), Paper(P), forced_to_submit(A, P).
can_view(U, PO) :- User(U), Poster(PO), has_access(U, PO).
can_select_best(PC, P) :- ProgramCommittee(PC), Paper(P), supports_selection(PC, P).
can_view(U, O) :- User(U), Overview(O), updated_at(O, T).
can_inform(PCC, M, PA) :- PCC(PCC), Maintainer(M), Paper(PA), Meeting(MT), has_accepted_paper(MT, PA).
can_submit(A, AB, P) :- Author(A), Abstract(AB), Paper(P), has_abstract(A, AB), has_paper(A, P).
can_send_comment(PC, A, C) :- ProgramCommittee(PC), Author(A), Comment(C), Paper(P), selected_paper(P), has_comment(P, C), authored_by(P, A).
can_learn_opinion(R1, R2, O) :- Reviewer(R1), Reviewer(R2), Opinion(O), has_opinion(R2, O).
can_submit_review(U, R) :- User(U), Review(R), (submitted_via_webpage(U, R); submitted_via_email(U, R)).
can_access(R, REV) :- Reviewer(R), Review(REV), has_directory(R, D), associated(REV, D).
can_classify(R, P, F) :- Reviewer(R), Paper(P), ReviewForm(F), assigned_to(R, P).
can_be_in_preference_list(R, L) :- Reviewer(R), PreferenceList(L), not max_reviews_reached(R). max_reviews_reached(R) :- Reviewer(R), count(assigned_reviews(R, _)) >= MAX_REVIEWS.
can_assign_review(R, P) :- Reviewer(R), Paper(P), has_priority(R, P, Priority).

can_assign_paper(R1, P) :- Reviewer(R1), Paper(P), has_expertise(R1, EV1), has_expertise(R2, EV2), EV1 = EV2, papers_assigned(R1, Count1), papers_assigned(R2, Count2), Count1 < Count2, not exists(R3) (Reviewer(R3), has_expertise(R3, EV3), EV3 = EV1, papers_assigned(R3, Count3), Count3 < Count1).
can_print(R, O) :- Reviewer(R), Overview(O), wants_to_read_offline(R, O).
can_access(R, F) :- Reviewer(R), ReviewFile(F), has_directory(R, D), contains_file(D, F).
can_generate(S, P, T) :- System(S), Proceedings(P), TableOfContents(T), has_input(A, P). can_generate(S, P, I) :- System(S), Proceedings(P), AuthorIndex(I), has_input(A, P).
can_submit_step1(A, P) :- Author(A), Paper(P), has_paper(A, P). can_submit_step2(A, P) :- Author(A), Paper(P), has_paper(A, P), can_submit_step1(A, P).
can_prepare_proceedings(M, S, P, T) :- Maintainer(M), Paper(P), Session(S), TemplateFile(T), submitted(P), part_of(P, S), has_template(S, T).
can_generate(M, PA, R) :- Maintainer(M), Page(PA), Reviewer(R), distributed(P, R), not generated_page(PA, R).
can_view_other_reviews(R, P) :- Reviewer(R), Paper(P), has_submitted(R, P, REV), not (Reviewer(R2), has_submitted(R2, P, REV2), R2 != R).

can_view_reviews(R1, Rev) :- Reviewer(R1), Review(Rev), submitted_review(R2, Rev), Reviewer(R2), R1 != R2, not interfered_by_maintainer(Rev). interfered_by_maintainer(Rev) :- Maintainer(M), Review(Rev).
can_send_copy(S, M, P) :- Sender(S), Message(M), PCC(P).
can_display_default(R, P, Rev) :- Reviewer(R), Paper(P), Review(Rev), submitted_review(R, P, Rev).
can_access_review_form(R, F) :- Reviewer(R), ReviewForm(F), assigned_to(R, P), not page_regenerated(R, P).
can_match_paper_to_expert(PC, P, E) :- PC_Member(PC), Paper(P), Expert(E), is_domain_expert(E, P).
can_select(PM, P, C) :- PC_Member(PM), Paper(P), Conference(C), is_member_of(PM, C).
can_upload(U, F) :- User(U), File(F), not is_demo_data(F).
can_review(R, P) :- Reviewer(R), Paper(P), Topic(T), has_expertise(R, T), willing_to_review(R, T).
can_view(C, O) :- Chair(C), Overview(O), available_to(C, O).
can_submit_camera_ready(A, P, CRV) :- Author(A), Paper(P), CameraReadyVersion(CRV), submitted(A, P).
can_access_paper(R, P) :- Reviewer(R), Paper(P), CyberChair(C), not has_submitted_review(R, P).
can_use(A, W) :- Author(A), Webform(W). can_use(R, W) :- Reviewer(R), Webform(W).
can_display_review(U, R) :- User(U), Review(R), has_last_update(R, DateTime).
can_modify(A, I) :- Author(A), Information(I), submitted_in_step1(A, I).
can_access_workspace(U, S) :- User(U), System(S), has_access(U, A), has_access(U, P), has_access(U, R).
can_update(U, R) :- User(U), Review(R), has_review(U, R).
can_enter_review_process(A, P) :- Author(A), Paper(P), is_author_of(A, P), sent_to_pcc(A, P).
can_view(R, Rev) :- Reviewer(R), Review(Rev), has_access(R, Rev).

can_copy_reviews(R, P) :- Reviewer(R), Paper(P), assigned_to(R, P), has_directory(R, Dir), has_review(P, OtherR, Rev), Reviewer(OtherR), OtherR != R, not has_review_in_directory(R, Rev, Dir). has_review_in_directory(R, Rev, Dir) :- Reviewer(R), Review(Rev), Directory(Dir).
can_browse(R, P, T) :- Reviewer(R), Paper(P), ConferenceTopic(T), has_interest(R, T), has_expertise(R, T), matches_topic(P, T).
can_assess(R, P) :- Reviewer(R), Paper(P), has_classification(P, C), highest_classification(P, C), lowest_classification(P, C).
can_generate_hyperlink(U, P, H) :- User(U), Paper(P), Hyperlink(H), has_access(U, P).
can_access(R, W) :- Reviewer(R), Webpage(W), has_webpage(R, W). can_download(R, P) :- Reviewer(R), Paper(P), assigned_to(R, P), contains_link(W, P), has_webpage(R, W).
can_send_or_upload(M, Pub, Proc) :- Maintainer(M), Publisher(Pub), Proceedings(Proc), allows_electronic(Pub).
can_generate(CyberChair, R, W) :- System(CyberChair), Reviewer(R), Webpage(W).
can_indicate_preference(R, P) :- Reviewer(R), Paper(P).
can_store(M, D, P) :- Maintainer(M), Disk(D), Paper(P), has_disk_space(D, P).
can_use_hyperlink(R1, HL) :- Reviewer(R1), HyperLink(HL), has_conflict(REV), Review(REV).
can_give_special_attention(R, C, S) :- Reviewer(R), Chair(C), Submission(S), has_agreement_level(S, L1), has_agreement_level(S, L2), L1 != L2, threshold_exceeded(L1, L2).
can_use_pattern(C, P, PT) :- CyberChair(C), PC(P), Pattern(PT), supports(C, P).

can_access(U, CV, RPP) :- User(U), CyberChairVersion(CV), ReviewProcessPhase(RPP), supports(CV, RPP). can_access(U, CV, Proc) :- User(U), CyberChairVersion(CV), Proceedings(Proc), supports(CV, Proc), prescribed_format(Pub, EF).
can_fill_online(R, F) :- Reviewer(R), ReviewForm(F), likes_to_fill(R, F).
can_use(C, P) :- CyberChair(C), PC(P), reduces_workload(C, P).
can_share(P, I, PR) :- Person(P), Information(I), Problem(PR), has_access(P, I).
can_access(R, L, PW) :- Reviewer(R), Login(L), Password(PW), has_login(R, L), has_password(R, PW).
can_communicate(R, C) :- Reviewer(R), Conflict(C), has_conflict(R, C).
can_send(C, P, LP, E) :- CyberChair(C), ContactPerson(P), LoginPassword(LP), EmailAddress(E), has_email(P, E).
can_start(M, S) :- Maintainer(M), Script(S), administrative_script(S), started_by(S, M).
can_start_automatically(S, SC, I) :- System(S), Script(SC), Interval(I), is_administrative(SC), started_at_interval(S, SC, I).
can_read(R, REV) :- Reviewer(R), Review(REV), submitted_review(R, _), not same_reviewer(R, REV). same_reviewer(R, REV) :- Reviewer(R), Review(REV), submitted_review(R, REV).
can_prepare_for_meeting(R, M) :- Reviewer(R), Meeting(M), Review(REV), submitted(REV).
can_find_out(U, E) :- User(U), Event(E), can_access(U, E).
can_select(R, P) :- Reviewer(R), Paper(P), has_submitted_all_reviews(R), has_time_to_review_more(R), has_conflicting_reviews(P).
can_deliver(C, P, TOC, AI) :- CyberChair(C), Publisher(P), TableOfContents(TOC), AuthorIndex(AI), generates(C, TOC), generates(C, AI).
can_deliver(A, PUB, PA) :- Author(A), Publisher(PUB), Paper(PA), has_paper(A, PA).
can_handle(C, P) :- CyberChair(C), Paper(P), handles_distribution(C, P).
can_collect(C, R) :- CyberChair(C), Review(R). can_categorize(C, R) :- CyberChair(C), Review(R).
can_prepare_overview(C, O) :- CyberChair(C), Overview(O). can_access_overview(P, O) :- PC_Member(P), Overview(O), prepares_overview(C, O).
can_check(C, R) :- CyberChair(C), ReviewForm(R), is_correct(R).
can_convert(M, P) :- Maintainer(M), Paper(P), submitted_paper(P).
can_ask_to_submit(M, A, P) :- Maintainer(M), Author(A), Paper(P), submitted_by(P, A).
can_send(PCC, PA, RF, R) :- PCC(PCC), Paper(PA), ReviewForm(RF), Reviewer(R).
can_fill(R, F) :- Reviewer(R), ReviewForm(F), assigned_to(R, F).
can_send(R, F, P) :- Reviewer(R), ReviewForm(F), PCC(P), has_form(R, F).

can_access(S, A) :- System(S), Author(A), stores(S, A). can_access(S, AB) :- System(S), Abstract(AB), stores(S, AB). can_access(S, P) :- System(S), Paper(P), stores(S, P). can_access(S, RE) :- System(S), Review(RE), stores(S, RE).
can_submit(A, P, PCC) :- Author(A), Paper(P), is_author_of(A, P), is_accepted(P).

can_send(PCC, PUB, CRF, PF, TOC) :- PCC(PCC), Publisher(PUB), CameraReadyFormat(CRF), Preface(PF), TableOfContents(TOC), has_camera_ready_format(PCC, CRF), has_preface(PCC, PF), has_table_of_contents(PCC, TOC).
can_display(C, RF, BF) :- CyberChair(C), ReviewForm(RF), BrowserFormat(BF), transforms(C, RF, BF).
